events.message: I received the wrong size shirt and would like to request a refund for my order. Please let me know how to proceed.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on customer's request for money back due to incorrect item.
The case has been assigned to the refund processing team to address the customer's refund request.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the incorrect size you received. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please confirm your order number and upload a photo of the shirt you received so we can verify the error?
My order number is 123456789. I’ve attached pictures of the shirt which clearly show it is a size large instead of medium.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for your quick response and help. I appreciate the prompt refund offer and look forward to receiving it soon.
The refund process has been completed successfully and the case is now resolved. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
Just following up to ensure that you have received the refund and everything is satisfactory with your case.
Since we have not heard back, your refund case will be closed now. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
